questions.stem: Which of the following describes Newton's second law, also known as F=ma?
options: A) A constant force acting on an object will not change its motion unless a torque is applied.
B) The acceleration of an object is directly proportional to the net force acting on it and inversely proportional to its mass.
C) The weight of an object is always equal to its momentum.
D) The speed of an object is directly proportional to the net force acting on it.
questions.rationale: Newton's second law describes the relationship between force (F), mass (m), and acceleration (a).
